This is a testharness.js-based test.
[FAIL] i32, mutable
  myglobal.type is not a function
[FAIL] i32, immutable
  myglobal.type is not a function
[FAIL] i64, mutable
  myglobal.type is not a function
[FAIL] i64, immutable
  myglobal.type is not a function

  myglobal.type is not a function
[FAIL] f32, immutable
  myglobal.type is not a function

  myglobal.type is not a function
[FAIL] f64, immutable
  myglobal.type is not a function

  myglobal.type is not a function
[FAIL] externref, immutable
  myglobal.type is not a function
[FAIL] funcref, mutable
  WebAssembly.Global(): Descriptor property 'value' must be a WebAssembly type
[FAIL] funcref, immutable
  WebAssembly.Global(): Descriptor property 'value' must be a WebAssembly type
[FAIL] key ordering
  myglobal.type is not a function
Harness: the test ran to completion.
